text.content:
# OpenInfra Days Special Edition

**OpenInfra Days Europe is a series of community-powered OpenInfra Days and meetups throughout Europe.**

The event will take place throughout **May and June 2024 in Sweden, Germany, Turkiye and France**.

### OpenInfra Day Sweden

* May 7, 2024
* [Volvohallen](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Gunnar+Engellaus+v%C3%A4g+2,+418+78+G%C3%B6teborg,+Sweden/@57.7242383,11.8490387,17z/data=!4m16!1m9!3m8!1s0x464f8c78c6219f2b:0x1a73507f9863eb79!2sGunnar+Engellaus+v%C3%A4g+2,+418+78+G%C3%B6teborg,+Sweden!3b1!8m2!3d57.7242775!4d11.8483159!10e5!16s%2Fg%2F11cnd7r_rq!3m5!1s0x464f8c78c6219f2b:0x1a73507f9863eb79!8m2!3d57.7242775!4d11.8483159!16s%2Fg%2F11cnd7r_rq?entry=ttu), Gothenburg, Sweden
* **Register with the form above** | **[Schedule](https://www.oidsweden2024.se/schedule)**

### OpenInfra Day Germany co-located with [Sovereign Cloud Stack Summit](https://scs.community/summit2024/)

* May 15 (*SCS Summit, held May 14, [requires a separate registration](https://scs.community/summit2024/)*)
* [Villa Elisabeth](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Villa+Elisabeth/@52.5331269,13.3972411,15z/data=!4m6!3m5!1s0x47a851f492be67f9:0x70038e11de799c16!8m2!3d52.5331269!4d13.3972411!16s%2Fg%2F11jfcbz7dv?entry=ttu), Berlin, Germany
* **Register with the form above** | **CFP has closed** | **[Sponsorship Info](https://openinfra.dev/events/sponsorship/#Germany)**

### OpenInfra Day Türkiye

* May 20, 202[](https://maps.app.goo.gl/rPTB4oZabiJtfYdE9)4
* [Albert Long Hall Cultural Center](https://maps.app.goo.gl/rPTB4oZabiJtfYdE9), Boğaziçi University, Istanbul, Türkiye
* **[Register Now](https://openinfraturkiye.org.tr/event-registration/) | [CFP](https://openinfraturkiye.org.tr/call-for-presentations)** **\|** **[Sponsorship Info](https://openinfra.dev/events/sponsorship/#Turkiye)**

### OpenInfra Day France

* May 22, 2024
* [EDF Lab Paris-Saclay](https://maps.app.goo.gl/sxxPmcTnYe4Dh3f18), Paris-Saclay, France
* **Register with the form above |** [](https://openinfrafoundation.formstack.com/forms/2024_openinfra_days_france_cfp)**CFP has closed**

  *\*\* Note: refunds and ticket transfers for OpenInfra Day France will be processed until 4 May 2024 at 23:59 PM CET.*

### OpenInfra Day Hungary

* June 3, 2024
* Budapest, Hungary, [Telekom Headquarters,
   Puskás conference room](https://wing.hu/en/project/telekom-hq)
* **Register with the form above** | **[CFP](https://forms.gle/5uhidFatr2sLp6qNA)** | **[Sponsorship Info](mailto:HU_DT_TSI_CS_BO@t-systems.com)**
